features: Intensely nourishes damaged hair, giving it the attention it needs
Smooth onto wet hair, leave on for 1-2 minutes then rinse thoroughly
For a weekly intensive treatment use Toni & Guy damage repair mask
Born and bred in London, Toni & Guy collection of hair care and styling products is inspired by backstage know how to help you create your look from the hair down
description: Product Description Give your hair a break from the hair dryer and hair straighteners for some well-deserved time off. Toni & Guy damage repair conditioner intensely nourishes damaged hair, giving it the attention it needs. Smooth onto wet hair, leave on for 1-2 minutes then rinse thoroughly. Use with Toni & Guy damage repair shampoo for results or choose damage repair mask for a weekly intensive treatment from root to tip, leaving hair more manageable. Pair with a styling product from one of our styling ranges – texture, smooth or volume to create a style and complete your look. Toni & Guy damage repair conditioner is also available in a larger size so you can use your favourite product as part of your normal routine. Born in London from a devout love of fashion, Toni & Guy products are inspired by catwalk looks and are used backstage to create standout hair looks for London’s most exciting fashion designers. Toni & Guy celebrates individuality, empowering you to express your style through hair and fashion and to create your look from the hair down. Looking for hair style inspiration? Check out the website Toni & Guy- products for professional tips on how to achieve catwalk ready hair styles. We would love to hear your thoughts! If you enjoyed using this product, please share a review. Ingredients AQUA (WATER), CETEARYL ALCOHOL, DIMETHICONE, STEARAMIDOPROPYL DIMETHYLAMINE, LACTIC ACID, BEHENTRIMONIUM CHLORIDE, GLYCERIN, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, AMODIMETHICONE, PETROLATUM, PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM (MINERAL OIL), TREHALOSE, GLUCONOLACTONE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, ADIPIC ACID, SODIUM SULFATE,mDISODIUM EDTA, PEG-150 DISTEARATE, PEG-7 PROPYLHEPTYL ETHER, CETRIMONIUM CHLORIDE, PEG-180M, SILICA, DMDM HYDANTOIN, PHENOXYETHANOL, METHYLCHLOROISOTHIAZOLINONE, METHYLISOTHIAZOLINONE, MAGNESIUM NITRATE, MAGNESIUM CHLORIDE, CITRONELLOL, GERANIOL, LIMONENE, LINALOOL, CI 17200 (RED 33), CI 19140 (YELLOW 5). Directions Apply a small amount to wet hair, massage through, leave on for 1-2 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. See more
